snippet.title: HellSign - Coming soon trailer
snippet.description:
Check it out on Steam! http://store.steampowered.com/app/606500?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=kstrailer
HellSign is a supernatural investigative hunting RPG, where you assume the role of a freelance hunter building your career towards uncovering the ultimate terror.

Follow us on:
Website - www.ballisticinteractive.com
Facebook - www.facebook.com/HellSignGame
Twitter - www.twitter.com/BstInteractive
IndieDB - www.indiedb.com/games/HellSign
